name: Dragonair

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

flavorText: A mystical Pokemon that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

strengths: Colorless costs work with any energy
weaknesses: 4 energy for Hyper Beam is expensive for 20 damage
counters: High damage attackers - Can overcome Dragonair's HP

description: Dragonair is a Stage 1 Colorless-type Pokemon with no weakness and Psychic resistance. It features Slam for variable damage and Hyper Beam for energy disruption. Its Colorless typing makes it versatile.
competitiveHistory: Dragonair was occasionally used for its favorable typing (no weakness, Psychic resistance) and energy disruption. However, its low damage output limited competitive viability.
